name: Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Blockchain Technologies & Cryptocurrencies

Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Bl: Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Blockchain Technologies & Cryptocurrencies The Certificate of Undergraduate Study (CUGS) in Blockchain Technologies & Cryptocurrencies is designed to offer students the opportunity of a specialized study to provide students with experience in key courses of this discipline at the undergraduate level. The educational goals of this CUGS is to provide students with experience with basic programming (e.g., Python), cryptographic techniques used in blockchain technologies, blockchain programming, and the applications of blockchain.
Program Requirements: Program Requirements Students seeking this CUGS will be required to complete the four courses listed below. This CUGS is available to all majors except Computer Science and Computing & Informatics. No previous experience or knowledge of blockchain technologies is required.

courses.subject: CS
courses.title: Introduction to Programming and Problem Solving (no prereqs; Python language strongly recommended)

courses.subject: CS
courses.title: Blockchain Programming * (requires CS 10250 - Cryptography and Blockchain Essentials)
